website_summaries.verdict: Two colors in each tube blend together to blur fine lines and uneven skin tones.
pros: Provides a very natural look that leaves skin feeling and looking dewy
Can even cover up some freckles and rosacea
Also works well as a primer
cons: Extremely fair or dark users did not find the shades acceptable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, horrible price for quantity.  It looked like a trial size!
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing, price for the quantity is ridiculous. You’re better off to order true sizes from Sephora for less than $20.00 more and get double. Highly disappointed. Pictured in my hand... my hands are small, and my ring finger is a size 4-1/2, so that should give you a good idea. Tub is no bigger round than my thumb, and my thumb is a size 7 ring.... don’t get baited into it just because it’s good product.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows a 1.5 ounce tube, and the ml are unreadable, so unless you know that 15 ml is half an ounce, you think you're receiving a full size product For $10 more you can receive 2/3's more product from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color - Returned
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that this was the medium color and not the fair one, so I returned. However, overall the quality of this product is good. It is not meant for a lot of coverage, just a little bit of evening out the tone. It is a little oily feeling at first, but it is actually a really nice moisturizer and makes you feel comfortable going outside without doing a full face of makeup. I really like this stuff (when I buy the right color) for my 'no makeup makeup' days.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rockwood

customer_reviews.title: Not right size described in the item description - it's 1/3 the size described
customer_reviews.text: The product is really good but the description in the site is misleading - very frustrated with Amazon's quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Clelia V M Ventriglia

customer_reviews.title: Must try it out ! It does what it says !!!:D
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with the price !!!! It's still alittle pricey but alot better than the original price. I've bought it at Sephora first and I'm starting to run out, so I reordered it through here !
customer_reviews.author: Secret

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly natural and done up!
customer_reviews.text: 100% love this product!! After I put it on it is like my skin is transformed into its most glowing self! It’s really like and blends really well! I didn’t want heavy makeup for my wedding because it was going to be outside, hot, humid, and I just don’t like wearing makeup. This was perfect for looking done up a bit, natural, and still being yourself. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Orange tint
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a feeling of skin tanner or sunblock with a small tint.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best koren cc cream. Even worked its magic in hot humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: meghna

customer_reviews.title: Smooth cover and sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very sheer, but gives a touch of color for evenness. Good sunscreen too!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Like that it matches my skin well, but wish it gave more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. But this is expensive for the size that you get.
customer_reviews.author: AnA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good to have if I dont want to put on makeup but still have that fresh look
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get as close as possible to ur skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Tint/color not suitable with a tanned face- it was too light for me..
customer_reviews.author: RitaS

customer_reviews.title: Dore shade too orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Dore shade and it was too orange even for my tan skin. Do not recommend this shade
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Too small too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Meh it could be better, too small tube for the price
customer_reviews.author: Patrica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could for product and service. The cream does not blend enough and leaves my skin looking like I just put sunscreen on. Do not buy it you are trying for the first time because you won't get a refund if you are dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty good skin
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty good skin, and just wanted something to even me out. This was just not great. If you have pink undertones it might work okay. But for olive skin or yellow undertones it just leaves you looking weird.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: A very natural and uplifting foundation
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and cannot wear heavy makeup. This is the perfect answer. I love the way my skin is actually enhanced, not covered.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Chipley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Get Any Better!
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on smooth, doesn't leave a tight or rough finish, it can be reapplied for extra coverage, the color is perfect for any light to medium skin tones and the size is great for the money. I will be buying this item regularly.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA E.

customer_reviews.title: not for pale cool or nuetral.
customer_reviews.text: Orange orange orange...which sucks so bad because it lays on the skin beautifully and my skin instantly feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This was a big step up from the BB creme I was using! Has good coverage and doesn't need to be powdered down! Seems a little expensive, but I'll probably buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: SandraDee

customer_reviews.title: Color adaptation is magical
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product because it comes out white. But as soon as I apply it to my face it changes color to my exact skin tone. Truly magical. I came across this because I was unable to get my usual Armani CC cream. I'm glad I did. I am now on my 2nd tube of this and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Delgato

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Love the light feeling and light coverage. With sunscreen. Perfect for those who don’t like the heavy feeling of foundation. It’s a sheer coverage and feels more like a tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mimo_808

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's good, but you do have to reapply and it's a bit on the orange side,but it's easy to apply and you don't use alot of product.
customer_reviews.author: irssa marinez

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but I keep buying it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Gives a nice no makeup look. The sunscreen in it is not irritating at all. Use it underneath makeup sometimes and it seems to make the makeup look fresher for longer. Only negative is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Barie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cc cream with spf
customer_reviews.text: It s second time i buy it, i like it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Simply thr best stuff you can put on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use to use Channel makeup, but this goes on much smoother. I’m 67 and get compliments on my skin all the time. Will keep buying this as long as it’s around
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ray

customer_reviews.title: A little more than I'd like to spend to try something, but totally worth it so glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: I like to have a natural look but do need a little something to even out my skin tone. This is pure perfection. I've tried products that adjust to your skin tone before, and they have not actually adjusted to my skin tone, always added a little gray or pink undertones. This CC cream somehow does manage to get right to my actual skin tone. It's also not too greasy but does add some moisture which is good since i have combination skin. A little more than I'd like to spend to try something, but totally worth it so glad I did. *If you are looking for full coverage this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bee ILI

customer_reviews.title: it left me with a very noticeably orange tint like a self tanner
customer_reviews.text: ORRRRRRRRRRANGE! it left me with a very noticeably orange tint like a self tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Diep

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS- use it every day now
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended I buy this for when I don't like to wear foundation, and now it's the only thing I wear. I get the Claire (clear) and love the SPF. I put on regular SPF first, and then this acts like a foundation, a pore blur and a finisher topcoat, so to speak, and does not cause me to break out. I get compliments on my skin and two friends who tried it while traveling together are now using it too. Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: TravelerGurl

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is a great CC cream. Covers well, light, can be worn with or without makeup (like in the summer when you don't need as much).
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Barringer

customer_reviews.title: It evens out my old lady skin tones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for a while now and like that it evens out my old lady skin tone without looking like make up. It is also a decent moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Zurick

customer_reviews.title: Price go down right after I received the item
customer_reviews.text: The cream was nice, but right after I received the item the price went down $6. Wonder if I should return the item and reorder
customer_reviews.author: Christine Yeung

product_meta.title: Erborian Cc Creme Hd High Definition Radiance Cream Skin Perfector Spf25 15ml (Dore/Medium), 0.5 Oz
product_meta.description: The Korean secret to a visibly perfect complexion is in high-tech, multi-use formulas to helps to improve the appearance of your skin, making it look luminous and soft.
feature_bullets: It improves the appearance of your skin.
Imparts a luminous and soft finish to the skin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
